mapper.sql: select koh.id, koh.content_id, koh.oper_id, koh.oper_time, koh.operation, koh.remark , kc.title as content_title,kc.event_type as event_type, op.pname as oper_name from knowledge_operation_history koh left join knowledge_content kc on koh.content_id = kc.id left join og_person op on op.pid = koh.oper_id
